laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial level 6700 U/L, decreased to 4200 U/L after prednisone administration.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased after azathioprine was restarted, later normalized.
Decreased from 46.8% (24 days before admission) to 22.8% (on admission at MGH), then recovered to 27.9% (14 weeks after admission).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 10.5 g/dL on admission (normal range is 13.5–17.5 g/dL).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased from 16.3 g/dL (24 days before admission) to 7.0 g/dL (50 days after admission), then increased to 9.6 g/dL (14 weeks after admission).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 24,000 per mm³ on admission (normal range is 4500–11,000 per mm³).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased from 24,000 per mm³ (on admission) to 8000 per mm³ (on 14 weeks after admission).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 728,000 per mm³ on admission (normal range is 150,000–400,000 per mm³).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 481,000 per mm³ (day 50), 415,000 per mm³ (day 50), and further to 337,000 per mm³ (14 weeks after admission).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 1.09 mg/dL on admission (normal range is 0.60–1.50 mg/dL).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 0.38 mg/dL (higher values not specified), then fluctuated and measured at 0.4 mg/dL and 0.3 mg/dL (14 weeks after admission).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 124 mmol/L on admission (normal range is 135–145 mmol/L).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased to 135 mmol/L (on day 48), and remained stable at 140 mmol/L on 14 weeks after admission.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 6.0 mmol/L on admission (normal range is 3.4–4.8 mmol/L).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 3.6 mmol/L (day 48), remained at 4.2 mmol/L on 14 weeks after admission.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 87 mmol/L on admission (normal range is 100–108 mmol/L).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Stabilized at 100 mmol/L on 14 weeks after admission.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 158 mg/dL on admission (normal range is 70–110 mg/dL).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 110 mg/dL (day 50), and stabilized at 108 mg/dL (14 weeks after admission).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 468 U/L on admission (normal range is 110–210 U/L).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Dropped to 283 U/L (14 weeks after admission).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 128 U/L on admission (normal range is 10–55 U/L).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 43 U/L by 50 days after admission, then increased to 101 U/L (14 weeks after admission).

laboratory_examinations.findings: 440 U/L on admission (normal range is 10–40 U/L).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Dropped to 57 U/L by 50 days after admission, then increased to 99 U/L (14 weeks after admission).
